m_szDocTitle: Honda to sell hydrogen fuel cell sedan this year - Tech Insider
m_szDocSumamry: print It's official: Hydrogen-powered cars are officially here. Honda will being leasingÂ its Clarity Fuel Cell sedan in California by the end of 2016. The car will have an anticipated refueling time of just three to five minutes and is expected to have a range of more than 300 miles, according to a press release . Honda Why just California you may ask? Because the hydrogen filling stations necessary to recharge the car are mostly only available in California due to the California Fuel Cell Partnership .
